resources.description:
This is [volume VII](http://www.gsk.ch/fr/les-monuments-d%E2%80%99art-et-d%E2%80%99histoire-du-canton-de-vaud-tome-vii-rolle-et-son-district.html) by Paul Bissegger of the series [*Les monuments d’art et d’histoire du canton de Vaud*](http://www.gsk.ch/fr/recherche-avancee.html?k=&ort=Waadt+%2F+Vaud+%2F+Vaud&inhaltssprache=All&autor=&verlag=All&reihe=2&kantonsband=&bandnr=). It covers [Rolle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rolle) and its [former district](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rolle_District) (now part of the district of Nyon).

**Please note:** The CC-BY license only applies to the text, for the images please see notices inside the book.

The file is offered in the [EPUB format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EPUB), which means it's basically a ZIP archive that contains xHTML files, images and a CSS style sheet. It is made accessible to the public by the [Society for Art History in Switzerland](https://www.gsk.ch) on occasion of the [Swiss Open Cultural Data Hackathon](http://make.opendata.ch/wiki/event:2016-07).
resources.name: Rolle et son district

organization.description: Datasets from GLAM (Galleries, Libraries, Archives and Museums) institutions that are open for (re-)use
organization.title: Open GLAM
organization.name: open-glam

name: gsk-shas-ssas
notes:
The [Society for Art History in Switzerland](https://www.gsk.ch) (German: [Gesellschaft für Schweizerische Kunstgeschichte GSK](https://www.gsk.ch/de), French: [Société d'histoire de l'art en Suisse SHAS](https://www.gsk.ch/fr), Italian: [Società di storia dell' arte in Svizzera SSAS](https://www.gsk.ch/it)) is a Swiss society dedicated to promoting the understanding of Swiss art history and particularly of Swiss topography of art, including the study and maintenance of Swiss cultural heritage sites.

The society publishes a wide range of monographies, guides and inventories. Best known among them are the series Art monuments of Switzerland (German: [Kunstdenkmäler der Schweiz](https://www.gsk.ch/de/die-kunstdenkmaeler-der-schweiz.html), French: [Monuments d'art et d'histoire de la Suisse](https://www.gsk.ch/fr/les-monuments-dart-et-dhistoire.html)), which includes more than hundred volumes, the quarterly journal [Kunst und Architektur in der Schweiz](https://www.gsk.ch/de/zeitschrift-ka.html) (French: [Art + Architecture en Suisse](https://www.gsk.ch/fr/revue-aa.html)) and a broad series of art guidebooks, the [Swiss Heritage Guides](http://www.gsk.ch/it/ricerca-avanzata.html?inhaltssprache=Englisch&reihe=7019).

**Please note:** The CC-BY license only applies to the text of the downloadable book, for the images please see notices inside the book.
title: Society for Art History in Switzerland
